checks.message: All required artifacts are present.
checks.expected: all required artifacts present

checks.message: Required JSON artifacts parsed successfully.
checks.expected: all required JSON parse

checks.message: Manifest contains required top-level keys.
Artifact index hashes resolve and match disk bytes.
checks.expected: artifact_index.artifacts[*].path exists and sha256 matches

checks.message: Artifact index covers all canonical primary outputs.
Manifest hash declarations match artifact bytes.
checks.expected: 20 declared hash/path pairs

checks.message: Manifest command exit codes match .exit_code files.
checks.expected: manifest command_exit_codes == *.exit_code

checks.message: Gate summary is consistent with machine outputs.
checks.expected: consistent gate summary

checks.message: Blocker lifecycle fields are valid.
checks.expected: valid blocker lifecycle values

checks.message: Blockers include valid blocking_scope values.
Red-team state satisfies enum and validator-first policy.
Adversarial subagent red-team artifact policy satisfied.
Active red-team pointer freshness is valid.
checks.expected: active pointer references latest round artifact and subagent id matches gate summary when declared

checks.message: Governance pointers are round-consistent and not stale.
checks.expected: manifest/gate red-team pointers and open day-close red-team blocker evidence must be round-consistent

checks.message: Canonical policy artifact exists when workspace is dirty.
checks.expected: canonical policy required when dirty

checks.message: Primary output pointers are canonical-routed when dirty.
Dirty outputs are diagnostic-only.
checks.expected: dirty* outputs should not route to canonical

checks.message: Canonicalization command provenance is valid.
checks.expected: dirty workspace requires promote_canonical_* exit codes and command log evidence for canonical primary outputs

checks.message: Cross-artifact claims are consistent.
checks.expected: gate summary exits align with manifest exits where declared

checks.message: Timestamp fields are non-decreasing.
checks.expected: first_generated_at <= generated_at <= updated_at

checks.message: Commit provenance alignment is valid.
checks.expected: manifest and clean-source commit SHA alignment when dirty

checks.message: Temporal provenance ordering is valid.
checks.expected: adjudicated_at <= attested_at <= manifest/generated artifacts and re-audit created_at not before adjudications

checks.message: Reasoning artifact exists for every adjudication batch.
checks.expected: manual_reasoning_<batch_id>.jsonl|.md for each batch

checks.message: Reasoning rows contain required fields.
Reasoning rows have exact 1:1 row_id coverage with adjudication.
checks.expected: exact 1:1 row_id mapping

checks.message: Queue linkage updates exist and match adjudication rows.
checks.expected: queue update rows for each adjudication row with status+adjudication_id

checks.message: Adjudication batches are split-homogeneous.
checks.expected: single split value per batch when split is present/required

checks.message: No synthetic generation and lineage attestation exists.
checks.expected: no scripted writes to adjudication*.jsonl and MANUAL_ADJUDICATION_ATTESTATION batch attestations present

checks.message: Adjudication quality heuristics satisfied.
Adjudication export policy is valid.
checks.expected: review/abstain rows must not be training-export-eligible unless explicit uncertain-export override is present

checks.message: Filename migration map hashes are valid.
checks.expected: migration map paths + sha256 fields match on-disk bytes

checks.message: Post-validation freeze is valid.
checks.expected: no mutable run_dir files modified after validate_day_bundle.exit_code anchor
